name: Sea Scraps
description:
--Info--

Sea Scraps is a game where you control a fish through his progressively polluted neighbourhood. The game was made for PolyMars' Seajam and for the #TeamSeas Movement which you can donate to using this link: https://teamseas.org/

--Controls--

The only controls are space or left click to jump and that's it :)

--Credits--
